title: Fallen Aces looks like pulp comics Dishonored in a new extended gameplay trailer
description: Men trying to kill me? Get in line, pal.

title: Carrion meets Castlevania in Necrofugitive—a 2D stealth-action game where your enemies can set traps and learn from your slaughter
description: The Thing, but make it fantasy.

title: Our favorite mini-Morrowind is adding a mysterious realm ruled by a clockwork god in its next update
description: Dread Delusion continues to be a worthy torchbearer for the Weird RPG.

title: Prodeus' new expansion hands you a spear and a grappling hook before sending you to attack and dethrone god
description: Or it sends you somewhere that looks very much like heaven, anyway, which is basically the same thing.

title: One of the best shooters of 2022 just surprise dropped its first new level since launch
description: I have been eagerly awaiting more Cultic.

title: Twisted Tower takes BioShock and turns it into a deadly game show run by a disturbed toymaker
description: What if Willy Wonka and Andrew Ryan fused their brains together?

title: Missing faces, levitating bodies, and NPCs with no respect for personal space: A celebration of Bethesda jank
description: Starfield’s NPCs are the wrenches in the open-world machine I’ve come to crave, thanks to a long history of janky Bethesda RPGs.

title: As CDPR resurrected Cyberpunk 2077, it focused on one word: 'believability'
description: Cyberpunk 2.0's changes to police, cyberware and skills all came from the same key objective.

title: NYT Connections hint and answers today: September 30 (#111)
description: C'mon, it's time to start the weekend with an NYT Connections win.
